content: If you can change your mind, you can change your life It’s amazing how true that line is. Seriously I can’t believe it. This is the year that everything changed for me. It’s all because I can only think positive thoughts and acknowledge the negative ones and say fuck off to them. I’m glad you shared this with us because people really need to know about this. Our brains work for us and not the other way around. Train your brain. It’s never too late
